docs.text: Accepting Plex Invite To know more about plex indetailed What is Plex 1. Step one : Create Plex account Use any one method below to create your Plex account. Once created, message me your plexid or the email address used to create the account Signup 2. Step two: Install Plex client Windows Desktop Android TV Amazon Fire TV Other Smart TVs 3. Step three: Setup your Home Open Plex client Click on Home Click More unpin them by clicking on the three dots unpin all of them "Live TV", Movies & Shows, Music,.. Pin your libraries Pin Foreign, Indian, Playlist & TVShows Go back to your Home select Pinned Your Home should look like this Plex app is available on wide range of Platforms 4. Step Four: Set stream quality Select Settings Select Quality Select Maximum from the drop menu 3. Set your 4 digit pin once you have loggedin the 1st step is to set your pin. Its realy useful if you trying to login from an TV App Edit pin - should be next to you name Sorry I forgot to capture the screenshot, but the screenshot should give you an rough idea

docs.title: 3. Set your 4 digit pin

docs.text: Adding your own movies 1. Adding from plex (only for plexpass users) a. Open plex Webclient b. Login with your plex credentials c. Search for content using the Search option d. Select Add to wishlist e. go to settings > watchlist > copy the rssfeed and share it with me ( this step only required once) f. thats it!, the content should appear on the libary in few hours, please report to me if the content did not show with in 6 hours g. you can start adding the movies following setps a,b & d h. Make sure the content is already available 2. Using Overseerr a. Open Overseerr and login using you plex credentials b. Bookmark the page for future use c. Find content e. Click request f. Manage your request under request tab !!! note Content should appear in the library with 1 - 6 hours, please report it to me for any issues
docs.title: Content
